name: Dragonwing
damage_resistances: one of the following: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison

special_abilities.name: Dragon Fanatic.
descriptions: The dragonwing has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonwing can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonwing ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

special_abilities.name: Fanatic Advantage.
descriptions: Once per turn, if the dragonwing makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage.

special_abilities.name: Limited Flight.
descriptions: The dragonwing can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
descriptions: The dragonwing has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonwing's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The dragonwing attacks twice with its scimitar.

actions.name: Scimitar.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) damage of the type to which the cultist has resistance.
